channel.title: Life Lessons on Dominic Minischetti
channel.description: Recent content in Life Lessons on Dominic Minischetti

item.title: I Never Thought I’d Grow a Beard
item.description: Growing a beard was never in my plans. But this accidental experiment taught me more about identity than I expected.

item.title: Why We Romanticize the Past (And Why It’s a Trap)
item.description: We often think the past was better, but nostalgia tricks us. Discover why we romanticize the past and how to appreciate the present.
